title: New kilonova has astronomers rethinking what we know about gamma-ray bursts
description: Long gamma-ray burst stems from neutron star merger, not usual supernova explosion.

title: Sunny Balwani sentenced to nearly 13 years in prison for Theranos fraud
description: Balwani was convicted in July on all 12 counts of fraud related to Theranos.

title: Gun stockpile in hospital closet leads to $63K in fines from NJ health dept.
description: It remains unclear what the hospital's marketing director was doing with the guns.

title: Oldest DNA yet sequenced shows mastodons once roamed a warmer Greenland
description: DNA left behind during a warm period is viable 2 million years later.

title: Amazon sued by DC attorney general for deceiving customers who tipped drivers
description: AG: Amazon has so far "escaped appropriate accountability" for consumer harm.

title: Apple adds end-to-end encryption to iCloud device backups and more
description: Company abandons its plans for CSAM scanning, too.

title: Please take the Ars Reader Survey, 2022 edition
description: 5 minutes of your time would really help us out. Yes, you! Share thy thoughts.

title: Scarlet fever is soaring in UK after pandemic lull; invasive infections kill 8
description: Rise seen as another aftereffect of the pandemic disrupting disease transmission.

title: San Francisco decides killer police robots aren’t such a great idea
description: Explosive robots were approved for the SFPD arsenal, then the protests started.

title: Twitter running major brands’ ads with extremist tweets—until they get flagged
description: Promoted tweets from "roughly 40 brands" appeared near extremist posts.

title: Two months of Intel Arc driver updates begin to fix low performance in old games
description: Latest beta driver can boost speeds of some DirectX9 games by 50 to 80 percent.

title: Four-person dev team gets Apple’s M-series GPU working in Linux
description: It's limited to desktops and older games, but Asahi has made real progress.

title: Microsoft promises Call of Duty for Nintendo consoles in surprise 10-year deal
description: Agreement also extends to continued Steam support for the ultra-popular shooter.

title: Diablo IV’s first hours provide welcome twists on a familiar formula
description: There’s a lot going on in the first 12 hours of the upcoming horror-fantasy RPG.

title: Mixing diesel and hydrogen provides big cuts in emissions
description: Existing engine designs can be modified to allow hydrogen injection.

title: Fifty years later, remastered images reveal Apollo 17 in stunning clarity
description: "Come toward me, baby! Looks like it’s moving... Don’t run over me!"

title: Squad’s solar-powered city car is coming to the US in 2024
description: Squad says in sunny climes like Las Vegas you may never need to charge it.

title: Marsquakes, recent volcanism suggest Mars still has a mantle plume
description: Elysium Planitia may be best explained by the same process that powers Yellowstone.

title: Review: The 2022 Dell XPS 13 is more than just a pretty face
description: Louder, lighter, and better-looking than your typical 13-inch XPS laptop.

title: New find suggests ankylosaur’s tail clubs were for bashing each other
description: The evolution of this weapon may have had little to do with threats from predators.
